output: html_notebook

```{r Load libraries}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r Load data}
trips = read_csv("data/trips.txt")
```

```{r Check route_id occurences}
#check if the routes have a reasonable number of trips a day.
trips %>% 
  mutate(day = str_match(trip_id, "(?<=\\.)\\w+?$")) %>% 
  group_by(route_id, day) %>% 
  summarise(trips = n()) %>% 
  View()
```
